Reviews.Title: BB Q10
Reviews.Author: Ruthie
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! Not big and bulky like the other 4Gs. I'd rather have purple, but white is better than the boring basic black. I wish I could change some colors on my calendar & text message screen, but overall after you learn how to use it's easy!!! So glad BB came out with a 4G that had the key board. Just what I've been waiting for!

Reviews.Title: Love my Q10 - not your typical giant smartphone
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. I love the keyboard and the screen is plenty big. It's not meant for a basic computer illetrate person like the iPhone which seems like a kids toy to me. This is an adult phone which has all the features I need in a phone. I love the size and the sturdy feel. It doesnt feel cheap or like it will break. The os is great and everything is lightning fast. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Efficient, fun and excellent camera
Reviews.Author: a nice person in MI
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone a couple months now and absolutely love it.  The battery life is very good, and the camera is AMAZING.  The screen is big enough to enjoy the graphics, and a keyboard is a must for me.  It took about 2 days to get used to the keys, which in fact are the most ergonomic I've ever had in several other brands.  The OS is solid, network very fast.  I do appreciate the hub that Blackberry added; thought I think it makes me more addicted to this phone :-)  Personally, I have all the apps I want on it, I guess it's a matter of preference.  The phone also has a nice, solid feel and is just the right size.  I hope Blackberry sticks around because I've finally found a phone just perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: Q10 worth the risk!
Reviews.Author: Bill H
Reviews.Content: I know there is a lot of apprehension to buy Blackberry product right now. I went with it for the keyboard, but the operation of everything else is faster and smoother than I would have expected. The keyboard is great, better spacing than the Bold. Touch screen is fun to work with the tiles are very helpful for jumping between programs/webpages. Great feel to the phone as well.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone !!!
Reviews.Author: S. Suwandi "Sue99"
Reviews.Content: Q10 is a huge and bestest upgrade of Blackberry, BUT only if users care more about solid quality of  technology, NOT contents, which actually will be catching up real soon. Smooth navigation between apps, a hub to link all your mailbox and notices (Linkedin, FB, Foursquare, Skype)  and texts is super awesome.. Camera and time shift technique are super cool.. Phone line is magically so so clear and crisp.. Using this really makes you feel  having the best tool to use your time efficiently in the best way.. Other phones need couple more steps and Q10 only needs two three sweeps to get the same things done (you need time to understand the flows but it's definitely not a rocket science at all).. No single crash, battery lasts the longest other phones would hardly beat.. Since iPhone era, consumer got so spoilt with contents, but rarely noticed the technology which actually should be a single main reason to upgrade a phone.. You can get contents, gaming, browsing, drawing, reading, watching video through a tablet.  It's silly to use a phone as a multi task entertainment hub, the phone size is never ever made to do justice.  This is ti.. The white color is as beautiful and classy  as Samsung but a smaller size to feel a good grip in one hand. I've been having Q10 for about a month. Try it, really !

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Smidgen
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this phone. It is solid and the new OS is fantastic! I can't put it down. It does everything I need it to and does it beautifully.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Q10
Reviews.Author: KLM "shipmstr"
Reviews.Content: I sent it back.  After 4 hours at Verizon they could not get it to receive or send phone calls.  The Internet worked.  I LOVE Blackberry but this was my last.  I am back to using my Blackberry Curve, slow, old, but old faithful.

Reviews.Title: blackberry q10
Reviews.Author: barbara
Reviews.Content: love my new blackberry.its just the right size.the white is pretty and the buttons are very easy to text with.

Reviews.Title: LLOOOOOVVVEEEEEE THIS Phone
Reviews.Author: True Thespian
Reviews.Content: Bestest Blackberry Phone EVER! The best of both worlds with the touchscreen and keypad. Great Deal, Great Phone, Great Price!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Robin Morris
Reviews.Content: Great phone, Loooong battery life!  easy to use. Love the key pad! I hope Blackberry keeps going, gets more apps.

Reviews.Title: Wish it had android apps
Reviews.Author: ANobleBeauty
Reviews.Content: I got a Blackberry because I wanted a keyboard. I hated my droid x2 and wanted a physical keyboard. The q10 had good reviews and is a great phone, but the lack of apps has gotten really old. I'm not a major app user, but everything in the Blackberry world is crap. As much as I love having a physical keyboard, it sucks not having access to the world of apps.

Reviews.Title: It has some good features
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: Overall, I am learning to use this (a gift from hubby).  It is so different from my previous phone.  My main problem is the physical handling of it--it is so slippery and easily dropped.  I think for people who already like touch screens (I am not one), it is probably quite fine.  I am grateful that it has a keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Give Blackberry a try!
Reviews.Author: Cat2daTrina
Reviews.Content: I've always been a fan with phones that actually has a keyboard and I was alittle nervous on getting the Blackberry cause they are losing sales from other smartphones but I know they will continue making their business worthwhile as long as they can have buyers like me. This phone is so easy to use for a smartphone and size is perfect. Keyboard is a breeze to type and if I can't type, talking to it makes it simple, too. There are limited apps but I use this phone for business so I don't need much other apps besides the office apps and those are perfect to this phone. Thanks Blackberry!

Reviews.Title: Why change all the familiar menus?
Reviews.Author: Lori in VA "Lori O."
Reviews.Content: Was not happy with the functionality of the phone and sent it back. Prefer the Bold from a couple of years ago, when everything was consistent with where it's been located during the past 10 years or so. If you like huge amounts of change and confusion, even after the tutorials, then get the Q10. Hope it dazzles you. I cannot say the same.
